original_text: And walked in the statutes of the heathen, whom the Lord cast out from before the children of Israel, and of the kings of Israel, which they had made.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 쫓아내신 이방 사람의 규례와 이스라엘 여러 왕이 세운 율례를 행하였음이라

sentences.original_text: And walked in the statutes of the heathen
whom the Lord cast out from before the children of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 주께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 쫓아내셨으니

sentences.original_text: and of the kings of Israel
